name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a results-driven Senior Backend Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in building and deploying scalable applications using **Elixir**, **Phoenix**, and **Postgres** alongside modern frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, and **Angular**. My strong expertise in **CI/CD** processes, utilizing tools like **GitLab**, ensures efficient delivery and integration of code. I have extensive cloud experience with **AWS**, and I am proficient in containerization technologies including **Docker** and **Kubernetes**.

I have successfully led the development of high-performance solutions in the healthcare and financial sectors, integrating AI/ML capabilities for enhanced predictive analytics and automation. My comprehensive knowledge in full-stack development covers **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, equipping me to build robust and secure applications compliant with standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. I bring a proven track record in implementing microservices architecture and developing MLOps workflows using tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
